analyzed: gsum gyis mchod la gtor ma sum yar du gtang /_mchod pa rnam lnga dbul/

analyzed: de'i mjug la 'khor dang longs spyod dngos grub stshol cig ces bya'o/_/nyin

analyzed: mo lha mo rnams kyi snying po bzlas te/_om ba sun+d+hu ri bye swa ha/_om tshan+d+ra kan+yi swa

analyzed: ha/_om dakhyai swa ha/_om su da'+yi swa ha/_om ar+ya yi  \u0f1eswa ha/_om su b+ha bye

analyzed: swa ha/_om gupyi swa ha/_om de byi swa ha/_om sa ra swa kyi _swa ha/_zas sna

analyzed: tshhogs kyi gtor mas mchod/_mchod pa rnam lnga dbul/_dngos grub blang ngo /_/

analyzed: nub mo pho sngags te/_om dzam+b+ha la dza len+d+ra ya swa ha/_om ma ni b+ha dra ya swa ha/

original: om pur+na b+ha da ya swa ha/_om d+ha na da ya swa ha/_om bai shra ba na ya swa ha/_om ki
analyzed: om pur+na b+ha da ya swa ha/_om d+ha na da ya swa ha/_om bai shra ba na ya swa ha/_om ki

analyzed: li ma la ye swa ha/_om pi tshi kun+da li ni swa ha/_om mu khen+d+ra ya swa ha/_om tsha

original: mong gi dngos grub sgrub pa'i thabs kyi man ngag
analyzed: mong gi dngos grub sgrub pa'i thabs kyi man ngag
translated: The esoteric instructions for accomplishing the common accomplishments

original: ren+d+ra ya swa ha/_gtor ma dbul/_mchod pa lnga dbul/_dngos grub blang /
analyzed: ren+d+ra ya swa ha/_gtor ma dbul/_mchod pa lnga dbul/_dngos grub blang /
translated: Offer the torma, make the five offerings, and take the accomplishments.

original: 'jam dpal gyi bsnyen pa rdzogs pa'i gtor ma la/_gnod sbyin pho mo la zla ba🔽gsum du mchod pa na 'dod pa phun sum tshhogs so/_/me tog lug ru dang / gu gul dkar po dang /_dkar gsum mngar gsum dang nas dang 'bru sna lnga'i
analyzed: 'jam dpal gyi bsnyen pa rdzogs pa'i gtor ma la/_gnod sbyin pho mo la zla ba gsum du mchod pa na 'dod pa phun sum tshhogs so/_/me tog lug ru dang / gu gul dkar po dang /_dkar gsum mngar gsum dang nas dang 'bru sna lnga'i
translated: If you make offerings for three months to the male and female yakshas of the torma of the completion of the approach of Manjushri, you will obtain whatever you desire.

original: sbyin sreg lan brgya rtsha brgyad byas na lha'i longs spyod dang mnyam par 'gyur ro/_/🔽tho rangs bya ze tsha na pho sngags mo sngags zlos pa yin/_/chu sbyin yang nas yang
analyzed: sbyin sreg lan brgya rtsha brgyad byas na lha'i longs spyod dang mnyam par 'gyur ro/_/ tho rangs bya ze tsha na pho sngags mo sngags zlos pa yin/_/chu sbyin yang nas yang
translated: If you perform one hundred and eight fire offerings of the flower of the goat, white gugul, the three white foods, the three sweet foods, barley, and the five grains, you will obtain enjoyments equal to those of the gods.

original: du btang na longs spyod phun sum tshhogs pa dang ldan no/_/de yang 'dod pa'i
analyzed: du btang na longs spyod phun sum tshhogs pa dang ldan no/_/de yang 'dod pa'i
translated: If you recite the male and female mantra at dawn when the sun is rising and repeatedly give water offerings, you will obtain perfect enjoyments.

original: don grub dam pa ste/_/gsung ngo /_/'di ni rin po che gter gyi sgrub pa'o/_/
analyzed: don grub dam pa ste/_/gsung ngo /_/'di ni rin po che gter gyi sgrub pa'o/_/
translated: This is the supreme accomplishment of the desired goal, it is said. This is the accomplishment of the precious treasure.🔽The tantra says:

original: rgyud las/_yid bzhin nor bu chen po 'chang /_/gsung ngo /_/thun mong
analyzed: rgyud las/_yid bzhin nor bu chen po 'chang /_/gsung ngo /_/thun mong
translated: “It holds the great wish-fulfilling gem.”

original: gi dngos grub sgrub pa'i thabs kyi man ngag_/slob dpon sdom pa bzang pos
analyzed: gi dngos grub sgrub pa'i thabs kyi man ngag_/slob dpon sdom pa bzang pos
translated: The esoteric instructions for the method of accomplishing the common siddhis🔽were composed by the master Sumati.

original: mdzad pa rdzogs so//_//
analyzed: mdzad pa rdzogs so//_//
translated: The deed is finished.🔽Now he is still alive, but we are not.

original: ba ba na/_da dung kho kho_ nas 'tshho /_wa te nga tshho/_bar ka kha'i_ /khyod tshhos ga ci nga dang /nad _lha sa/_/lag pa la/_/_ku tshho/_/
analyzed: ba ba na/_da dung kho kho_ nas 'tshho /_wa te nga tshho/_bar ka kha'i_ /khyod tshhos ga ci nga dang /nad _lha sa/_/lag pa la/_/_ku tshho/_/
translated: What have you done to me, to my father, to my brother, to my mother?
